Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT geometry, type FROM osm_landusages ORDER BY area DESC ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type FROM osm_landusages_gen WHERE type IN ('park', 'garden', 'forest', 'wood', 'cemetery', 'grass') AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, area FROM osm_waterareas_gen ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, area FROM osm_waterareas ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type FROM osm_waterways ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type FROM osm_waterways_gen ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type FROM osm_buildings ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, ref FROM osm_roads_gen WHERE type IN ('motorway', 'trunk', 'primary', 'secondary', 'primary_link', 'motorway_link', 'trunk_link') AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, admin_level FROM osm_admin WHERE admin_level > 2 AND admin_level < 10 AND geometry && !bbox! ORDER BY admin_level DESC ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, 'no' as maritime, iso, COALESCE(NULLIF("name:fr", ''), name) as name FROM itl_boundary ) AS data

( SELECT geometry, type, tunnel, bridge, ref, access, service, class FROM osm_railway WHERE service != 'spur' AND type NOT IN ('funicular', 'disused', 'tram', 'monorail') AND geometry && !bbox! ORDER BY z_order ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, ref FROM osm_roads WHERE type NOT IN ('path', 'footway', 'stairs') AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geometry, COALESCE("name:fr", name) AS name, 'fr' AS lang, capital, prio::int, NULLIF(ldir, '') as ldir, CASE WHEN type IN ('consulat', 'consulat_general', 'rp', 'bureau') THEN 'intermediate' WHEN type IN ('ambassade','hc') THEN 'embassy' WHEN type = 'capitale' THEN 'capital' ELSE type END AS type FROM city ORDER BY prio ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, COALESCE("name:fr", name) AS name, 'fr' AS lang, iso, prio::int, NULL as ldir, NULLIF(sov, '') as sov FROM country ORDER BY prio ) AS data

( SELECT geometry, 'fr' as lang, type, capital, NULL as ldir, CASE WHEN type='city' THEN 1 WHEN type='state' THEN 2 ELSE 100 END AS prio, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), NULLIF(int_name, ''), name) as name FROM osm_places WHERE name != '' AND type IN ('state', 'city', 'town') AND geometry && !bbox! ORDER BY prio, capital ASC, population DESC ) AS data

( SELECT geometry, 'fr' as lang, capital, CASE WHEN type='city' THEN 1 WHEN type='town' THEN 2 ELSE 100 END AS prio, CASE WHEN type IN ('hamlet', 'suburb', 'isolated_dwelling', 'neighbourhood', 'allotments', 'city_block') THEN 'minor' ELSE type END AS type, population, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_places ORDER BY prio, population DESC NULLS LAST ) AS data

( SELECT geometry, admin_level, 'fr' as lang, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_admin WHERE admin_level = 3 OR admin_level = 4 AND geometry && !bbox! ORDER BY admin_level DESC ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, 'fr' as lang, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_landusages WHERE name != '' AND geometry && !bbox! ORDER BY area DESC ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, 'fr' as lang, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_landusages_gen WHERE name != '' ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, ref, CHAR_LENGTH(ref) AS reflen, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_roads WHERE name!='' AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_waterways WHERE name!='' AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data
( SELECT geometry, type, COALESCE(NULLIF(namefr, ''), name) as name FROM osm_waterways_gen WHERE name!='' AND geometry && !bbox! ) AS data
